thread.title: Justify arrives as Kentucky Derby favorite

title: Justify arrives as Kentucky Derby favorite
text:
Justify arrives as Kentucky Derby favorite 9:17pm IST - 00:32
Bob Baffert, the trainer of Kentucky Derby favorite Justify, describes the horse as ''super talented'' and a ''man among the boys'' as the top contender arrived at Churchill Downs on Monday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Bob Baffert, the trainer of Kentucky Derby favorite Justify, describes the horse as "super talented" and a "man among the boys" as the top contender arrived at Churchill Downs on Monday.
